title: Definition of a population
text: The population of a study is the entire group of persons, things, or objects under which you are observing for the study. In general terms, it is the group from which you want to generalize the study results to.

title: Identifying Population
text: Think about what the question says in terms of who they want to pull data from. Is it ALL the people who will buy a particular product or a SMALLER GROUP of these people?
